front.court: IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT MADRAS
front.extra:
Original Application No.16 of 2021
in
Civil Suit No.5 of 2021
front.petitioner:
Aadarsha Chitralaya Pvt.Ltd.,
A Company incorporated under the Companies Act 1956,
Having its office at
Old No.20, New No.12, Flat No.A1,
Ramanathan Street, Kambar Nagar,
Mahalingapuram, Chennai-600 034.
front.respondent:
2.M/s.Allin Pictures,
No.35 B, 1 st Street, Logananthan Nagar,
Choolaimedu,
Chennai-600 094.
front.extra:
Prayer:-This Application is filed under Order XIV Rule 8 of Original Side Rules
read with Order XXXIX Rule 1 & 2 and under Sections 151 of CPC prayed to
grant an order of ad interim injunction, restraining the respondents/defendants,
their men, agents, employees or anyone acting through or under them, from

proceeding with the production, promotion or release of any film based on the
script annexed herewith as Plaint Document No.3, under the title "''Zindabad'" or
any other title, during the pendency of the present suit proceedings.
